attributes.action: Buy the Anglo-Saxon Staffordshire Hoard for the Nation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over £600,000 has been donated by the public towards the purchase of the Anglo-Saxon Hoard found last year in Staffordshire. Thousands of people have already queued to see this important part of our heritage.  It would be a great shame if the government were to let this national treasure go out of the country.

The Government should give the remaining £2.7 million needed to keep it in Britain and here for the education and enjoyment of its future generations.

There are only two months left to save The Staffordshire Hoard, so decisive action is needed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
